transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Kaun, uh, Shree Om Scientific se baat kar rahe hain Neeraj ji?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir, main Vijay Agarwal baat kar raha hun, senior manager baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se sir.
Executive: Sir, abhi aapke paas ek call aaya tha hamare IndiaMART se, service call aaya tha.
Executive: Aur aapne us pe not satisfaction ka aapne reply kiya tha sir aapne.
Customer: To main jaan sakta hun ki sir kya issue aap face kar rahe ho matlab ki kis kis ke liye aap not satisfied IndiaMART ki taraf?
Customer: Hamare jo samjho ki aapne appoint kiye hain na, wo Archit hai, Rahul hai, to un log ko hi puch lena chahiye na.
Executive: Ye aapke paas subah morning mein Rahul ne call kiya tha sir aapko?
Customer: Aapne jo, aapne jo RM jo hamare liye jo appointment kiye hain, to unko hi puchna chahiye, unko sab baat hua hai.
Customer: Abhi aap log 10 log phone karenge, 10 log ko hum sab yahi batayenge.
Executive: Sir, ye bas ek feedback ke liye call kiya tha ki aapne not satisfied.
Customer: Aapko to bas paisa, aapki company ko to paisa lena hai aur kuch to hai nahi.
Customer: Kya service de rahe hain, kya kiya wo kuch abhi last abhi day aa gaya tabhi aap ye sab active hue.
Customer: Jabhi wo abhi renewal ka aapka try hai aap log ka, aisa hai.
Executive: To lead mein problem aa raha hai sir aapko, buylead mein problem aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Abhi aap ek saal khatam hua tabhi aap puch rahe hain.
Executive: Sir, main bas feedback ke liye aaya tha isliye maine socha ki sir main aapko call kiya main, taki main aapki help kar saku sir is cheez ko leke sir ek baar.
Customer: Abhi aap kya help karenge?
Customer: Abhi to aapka ye time hamara khatam hone wala hai na.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan, last time pe kya aap help karenge?
Executive: Abhi aap batayenge to definitely help kari jayegi sir, kyu nahi ki jayegi help sir aapki.
Executive: Aap apna concern thoda sa mere ko khul ke batayenge to main bhi kuch suggestion de paunga ki sir is tarike se hum log aur better kar sakte hain sir cheezon ko.
Customer: Vikram pump ka kiya tha to Vikram pump ke badle Vikram pump ke parts ka wo lead aa raha hai.
Customer: Sab alag alag hi aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi sir jo galat aa raha hai main wo theek karwa dunga, aap mere ko batao kya galat kya aa raha hai mere ko bataiye to sahi ek baar.
Executive: Usko theek karne ke liye to hum yaha pe baithe hue hain sir. Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, aap sun rahe hain?
Customer: Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai boliye boliye.
Customer: Haan, to jo category hamari thi wo hisab se humko aayi nahi aur jo lead hame wo concern thi wo ek minute mein bhi wo mail mein open karte hain to lead expired mein aa jati hai. Ye kya matlab hai?
Executive: To lead aapke paas aati hai wo expire ho jati hai aap ye keh rahe ho?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Abhi bhaiya aap puchwa aur aapko jo karna hai wo kar le. Aapko karna hai to maine bata diya wo Rahul ko ki ek mahina aap karke bataiye to main continue karunga.
Executive: Sir aap ye dekho jaise aapka kuch product hai aapka pehle Remy Laboratory hai aapka, theek hai aap pehle isko badi consume kar lete the. Abhi aapne iska buy lena band kar diya sir aapne, theek hai?
Executive: To aap isko pehle consume karte the aapne iska buy lena band kar diya sir aapne. Uske alawa ek product hai aapka single phase vacuum pump. Aap iska buy consume, hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap iska buy consume kar rahe hain par ye wala product aapki catalog ke andar add nahi hai. To agar aap isme deal karte to kya hum usko add kar de aapki catalog ke andar?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Single phase vacuum pump ko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir only vacuum pump, vacuum pump ke parts ke sab inquiry aa rahi hai aapki yaha se.
Executive: Vacuum parts na? Haan ji. Nahi ye wala single stage hai, single stage vacuum pump ki baat kar raha hun main aapse.
Customer: Haan to wo to abhi pehle se bataya hai humne. Single stage vacuum pump ka humne category hamari pehle se batai hai.
Customer: Aur wo bhi aapko bataya hai ki bhai hamara jo area hai wo Gujarat hai, Maharashtra hai waha tak ka hi hai. To abhi aap Tamil Nadu se, Chennai se ya waha se Ambala se lead aap bhej rahe hain aur wo aap count kar rahe hain to koi matlab nahi hai.
Customer: Dusri baat ye aapke, aapke, aapke jo yaha pe jo sales wale bande the wo kyu nahi aa rahe hain? Wo jabhi wo samjho ki wo package humko contract karna tha tabhi wo aaye. Baad mein aaye nahi, unko phone kiya to bhi nahi aaye.
Customer: Kuch reason nahi kam karo.
Executive: Aap mere ko video meeting pe aap ek baar time dijiye, main aapke sath baith ke video meeting pe aapka pura catalog sahi kar ke deta hun main aapko sir. Aapki category sahi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Fir aage taki main aapka catalog ko sahi kar saku taki aapke paas relevant inquiry aapke paas aa sake sir. Ha yahi cheez ek saal ke baad aap karke denge to abhi ek saal mera khatam hone wala hai to abhi ek saal mera start hoga na aapko abhi sahi kar ke denge to.
Executive: Sir jo thoda bahut mistake aa raha hai wo sahi kar sakte hain lekin pehle aap use kar rahe the aisi baat nahi pehle bhi aapki baat chit nahi hui hai aapke representative se.
Customer: Nahi wahi mere ko to, mere ko to kuch concern nahi hua time bigda mera ulta wo lead open kar karke call kar karke.
Executive: Haan ye aapke paas Rahul Singh ji aur Abhimanyu call kar rahe honge na sir aapko baar baar?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Abhimanyu ke call aa rahe honge na Abhimanyu ke Rahul Singh ke?
Customer: Rahul Singh to abhi samjho ki char din se kar raha hai. Uske pehle to Archit dekh raha tha abhi wo Rahul bol raha hai kyu chod gaya. To chod gaya kuch nahi kiya usne Archit ne to uska matlab ye thodi hai hum to client hai wo aapki company hai. Aapne jo bhi uh, kaam kiya wo aapka hai. Wo sab internal hai.
Customer: 10 log ke phone abhi to sir abhi nahi hai Archit se to aapki pehle baat hoti thi September mein baat hoti thi aapki Archit ke sath to.
Customer: Are yaar jo bhi hai wo baat hui na hui wo sab abhi kya matlab hai? Aap, aap abhi mere ko dijiye trial aapki wo confirm lead bhejiye to main samjhunga to fir aage main dekhunga renewal ke liye. Otherwise mere video meeting pe aap aayenge to hum aapko thoda sa sahi kar ke denge educate kar ke denge sara kuch aapko uske andar video meeting pe ek baar karne ke baad mein bhi kya hai aap, aap package renew kar denge wahi.
Executive: Sir package renewal automatic to nahi ho payega payment ke sath hi package to renew kiya jayega sir.
Customer: Abhi, abhi aadmi hai na ek baar murakh banta hai dusri baar nahi banta hai. Aap ye samajh lo.
Customer: Aadmi ek baar murakh bana sakte ho aap log bar bar nahi bana sakte. Pure India ko bar bar nahi bana sakte aap.
Executive: Sir dekhiye dekho payment ke payment ke baad hi hum log isko aage badha sakte hain sir.
Customer: Dusri baar koi nahi ho sakti hai.
Executive: To aap aayenge sir video meeting pe Monday ko aap aana hai to Monday ko aa jao aap sir.
Customer: Nahi abhi aane ka abhi mere ko agar renew ka bol rahe hain na to mere ko nahi karna hai. Aapko thode din aapko agar sahi lead aapko bhejte mere ko agar batana hai kuch to aap bataiye otherwise otherwise aap customer loss kar rahe ho wahi hoga.
Customer: Customer ek mauka to deke dijiye ek mauka to deke dijiye ek baar.
Customer: Nahi aap manager level pe ho agar aapko main ye batau ki ek baar customer aaya hai agar customer ko agar fayda hota to samne se nahi batata ki bhai mere ko dusri bar kar do wapis kar do.
Customer: Main kyu abhi nahi kar raha hun?
Executive: Sir ek mauka to deke dekho sir main wahi to bol raha hun aapko cheeze sahi kar ke dunga aapko catalog ke andar sir.
Customer: Bhaiya aapko koi koi samajhdari ho to aap samajhiye ki ek saal ho gaya ek din nahi do din nahi teen din nahi ek saal aap log ne liya hai. Aur aisa bhi nahi humne try humne try bhi kiya hai aur aap log ke sath bhi baat kiya hai to abhi kuch aap log ka system mein barabar nahi kiya aap log ne kaam.
Executive: To abhi sir kya abhi interested hai ya nahi hai sir abhi aap aise sir. Nahi aap to manager hai to aap dikhao kuch. Haan ji. Aap manager level se baat kar rahe hain na to aapko dikhao. Haan to tabhi to main aapko service ke liye bol raha hun main paiso ke liye to baat hi nahi kar raha main aapko abhi. paisa ek rupya nahi dunga aapko ek baat abhi lamba aapka bhi time bigadna hai to bigadna abhi ek rupya main aapko agar mere se confidence mere ko lana hai to aap mere ko thode din kijiye wo bataiye aapka kaam fir main dekhunga. Sir main to aapko cheeze sahi kar ke dene ki baat kar raha hun main to paisa mang hi nahi raha aapke sir. sahi nahi sahi kar ke denge lekin kitna din mere ko milega aap bataye kitna din aap denge. Kya keh rahe hain? Kitna din ya kitni lead provide karenge mere ko sahi lead. Sir aapki aankho ke aage sara sahi kar ke dunga lead bhi aapke paas relevant dikhaunga main aapko. kitna kitna din ke liye mere ko kar ke aapke yaha se response milega ye mere ko bataiye. Sir main aapko immediate sari cheeze video meeting ke aap Monday ko aa jao main aapko sari cheeze sahi kar ke de dunga. Haan wahi main bol raha hun abhi mera package ka kya last date hai time kya hai? Aap ek baar time to do aane ka ek baar video meeting pe sahi cheeze sahi karne ke liye sir. Theek hai aap kal dopahar ko bhi 2 baje. 2 baje theek hai main kal main Monday ko fir aapko 1 baje call karta hun main aapko. Main kal ki baat kar raha hun. Sir kal hamara weekly off hai isliye main keh raha hun aapse. Theek hai. Watch karo yaar. Done sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's service.

- Appointed representatives are not helpful.

- Receiving irrelevant leads.

- Sales representatives not visiting after contract.

- Leads expire quickly after opening in email.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to fix the catalog.

- Executive offered a video meeting to correct catalog.

- Executive mentioned adding a missing product to catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to a video call on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, renewal, video meeting
